text: William Joel "Bucky" Covington III (born November 8, 1977 in Rockingham, North Carolina) is an American country music singer and songwriter. Covington was part of the 5th season of American Idol where he placed eighth. Covington released his debut album, Bucky Covington, in 2007. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Bucky Covington (2007) * Good Guys (2012) ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Country musicians Category:Singers from North Carolina
title: Bucky Covington
